summary: This bill, the "Bolstering America’s Democracy and Demanding Oversight and Government Ethics Act" (BAD DOGE Act), seeks to repeal President Trump's Executive Order establishing the "Department of Government Efficiency." It focuses on the actions of the U.S. DOGE Service (USDS) and U.S. DOGE Service Temporary Organization (USDSTO) under the alleged direction of Elon Musk, who is accused of exceeding his authority, violating federal statutes, and infringing upon constitutional rights. The bill aims to nullify the executive order and address concerns regarding the independence of federal agencies and the misuse of power.
